channel.title: [pi] completionist cape glitch?
channel.description:
I have just added the completion it's cape to my [Pi] client but the model doesn't show when wielded as you can see from the picture below, the drop and inv model show perfectly. I will add my item def in a second.
[img]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k594/bibbobbib/dbe3e3f5.jpg[/img]
Please help I have already looked on google and nothing worked
